## Duración de recorridos

Se calculó la mediana de las duraciones de los viajes en bicicleta de cada recorrido.
<br/>Se descartaron los recorridos que empiezan y terminan en la misma estación

```{r packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(plotly)
library(stringr)
library(magrittr)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
trip_paths <- trip %>%
  #head(50) %>%
  filter(start_station_id != end_station_id) %>%
  inner_join(
    station_02 %>%
      filter(city == 'San Francisco') %>%
      select(
        id,
        long,
        lat
      ),
    by = c('start_station_id' = 'id')
  ) %>%
  inner_join(
    station_02 %>%
      filter(city == 'San Francisco') %>%
      select(
        id,
        long,
        lat
      ),
    by = c('end_station_id' = 'id')
  ) %>%
  group_by(
    start_station_id,
    end_station_id
  ) %>%
  summarise(
    median_duration = median(duration),
    start_lat = lat.x[[1]],
    start_lng = long.x[[1]],
    end_lat = lat.y[[1]],
    end_lng = long.y[[1]],
    trips = n()
  ) %>%
  ungroup %>%
  mutate(
    path_id = row_number()
  ) %T>%
  print
```

```{r}
rides_lines <- trip_paths %>%
  #sample_n(10) %>%
  by_row(
    function(df) {
      df %>%
        gather(
          key = event,
          value = station_id,
          matches("station_id")
        ) %>%
        arrange(path_id) %>%
        mutate(
          event = event %>% str_extract("[a-z]+") %>% fct_inorder(),
          lat = if_else(event == "start", start_lat, end_lat),
          lng = if_else(event == "start", start_lng, end_lng)
        ) %$% 
        Lines(Line(cbind(lng, lat)), ID = path_id[[1]])
    },
    .to = "lines"
  ) %>%
  SpatialLinesDataFrame(SpatialLines(.$lines), data = .)
```

```{r, fig.width=9, fig.height=9}
qpal <- colorQuantile("RdYlGn", rides_lines$median_duration, n = 7, reverse = TRUE)
awesome_icon <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = 'bicycle',
  library = 'fa',
  markerColor = 'orange'
)

rides_lines %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatterNoLabels) %>%
  addPolylines(
    color = ~qpal(median_duration),
    opacity = 0.2
  ) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    ~long,
    ~lat,
    icon = awesome_icon,
    popup = ~name,
    data = station_02 %>% filter(city == 'San Francisco')
  )
```
